Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.client

Class GameListenerHandlerClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.client.GameListenerHandlerClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameListener, Serializable, Remote
public class GameListenerHandlerClient extends Object implements GameListener, Serializable
This class implements the GameListener interface and handles game events by delegating actions to the Flow object.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form
